'''Kinetic Fire''' is a four-day retreat for fire performers and object manipulators held annually in the United States.<ref name="kf-site">{{cite web |url=https://kineticfire.org/ |title=Kinetic Fire |publisher=Kinetic Fire |access-date=2026-02-11}}</ref>

== Format ==

Kinetic Fire operates as an open-share communal environment. Attendees participate in workshops, skill sharing, and fire spinning sessions across the four-day event. The retreat is oriented toward fire artists and object manipulators of all skill levels.<ref name="kf-site" />

== Location ==

The event was previously held at Stable Studios in Spencer, Indiana. It has since announced a move to College Corner, Ohio.<ref name="kf-site" />
